isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - IC BUS - FENDER MOUNTED MIRRORS - FENDER MOUNTED MIRRORS- INSTALL

note.para: An assistant may be required during the removal of the fender mounted rear view mirrors.
If the mirror assembly has the heated mirror option, unplug the mirror connector from the chassis pigtail. Remove the wire with pin connectors from the connector and feed wire through grommet.

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of hood and tilt to a 45 degree angle.
Beginning on the driver side fender, remove the 10-32 x 1 1/4" SST CRPNH screw and 10-32 HXHD SS (Items 1 and 6, Figure 28) nylok attaching the angle brace from the hood assembly.
Remove the 10-32 x 1 1/4" SST GRPNH screw (Items 1 and 4, Figure 28) attaching the forward hood attachment brace.

An assistant is required to hold mirror assembly while being removed. Remove 4 each, 10-32 x 1 1/4" SST CRPNH screws and 10-32 HXHD SS nyloks (Items 1 and 3, Figure 28). Remove mirror base mounting assembly.
Follow the same procedure to remove passenger side mirror assembly.
